Module hbpCommon

Dependencies

ui.bootstrap ui.router bbpConfig bbpOidcClient hbp-common-templates ngResource

Controllers

  • hbpMetaNavigationCtrl

    hbpMetaNavigationController is used to manage the menu on the top right of the site, including user name and settings.

Filters

  • primary
  • primary

  • hbpDollarToNewLine

    Filter hbpDollarToNewLine convert any dollar chars not part of a word by a single line return character.

  • hbpYesNo

    Filter hbpYesNo is used to convert truthy values to the string 'Yes' and falsy values to the string 'No'.

  • hbpDatetime

    filter to serialize a Date object into a string with the format: 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss'

  • hbpCapitalize

    filter to capitalize a string

  • hbpMarkdown

    filter to render a markdown string as HTML

Directives

  • hbpBreadcrumb

    hbpBreadcrumb generates a standard looking breadcrumb.

  • hbpContentDescription

    This directive displays a human readable version of an entity's content

  • hbpContentIcon

    This directive represents the icon corresponding to an entity's content

  • hbpErrorMessage

    hbp-error-message directive displays an error.

  • hbpGeneratedIcon

    Take the first letter of the two first word and generate an icon from them.

  • hbpHiresCanvas

  • hbpIcon

    This directive represents the icon corresponding to an entity type. It's possible to provide the type as a string (attribute: type) or an entity object (attribute: entity) having a property named _entityType.

  • hbpOnTouch

  • hbpPerformAction

    hbpPerformAction directive run an action when the given control is clicked. it can be added as an attribute. While the action is running, the control is disabled.

  • hbpUpNav

    hbpUpNav directive is a wrapper around hbp-up-nav, the Unified Portal Common menu bar.

  • hbpUserSelector
  • hbpUsercard

Services

  • hbpDialogFactory

    hbpDialogFactory provides generic UI dialog.

  • hbpExpandableList

  • hbpGroupStore

    hbpGroupStore service let you retrieve and edit groups.

  • hbpUserDirectory

    hbpUserDirectory service let you retrieve and edit user and groups.

  • hbpXhrProgressEventInterceptor

    Add support for tracking progress events using angular.

  • hbpCollabStore
  • hbpConfigStore

  • hbpErrorService

    hbpErrorService provides helper functions that all return an HbpError instance given a context object.

  • hbpHiResService

    hbpHiResolution service provides helpers to deal with screen pixel ratio.

  • hbpUiUtil

    This service contains utility functions dedicated to the UI.

  • hbpUtil

    This service contains utility functions.
